Html:
A hunter friend of mine mentioned that at one point in time he was able to see which stats were better for him in a graph (like int was better than agility, etc.).  Now, I've looked around a bit and haven't found out how he was able to do this in Rawr...

Can someone please help me figure this out?

A) Relative Stat Values chart.

B) Rawr does not use them internally, they are an output only. You should not use them unless you thoroughly read and understand the warning on that chart.
